q: to speed up decision-making at the Internet giant. In a regulatory filing last week, Google Inc. said that Eric Schmidt in December drew up a plan to sell some of his stock in the company. The pre-arranged trading plan was adopted in order to allow Eric Schmidt to sell a portion of his Google Inc. stock as part of his long-term strategy for individual asset diversification and liquidity, the filing said. As of December 31, Eric Schmidt had about 9.2 million shares of Google Inc. stock and controlled 9.6 percent of the company's voting power. Eric Schmidt plans to sell about 534,000 shares of Class

on Sunday. Media reports during Egypt's political unrest had quoted Zahi Hawass as saying that looters damaged two mummies, but in a BBC interview on Sunday he said that this was not the case. They were not mummies, there were two skulls taken outside from the CT scan machine. Everything will go back to normal at Cairo Museum today, said Zahi Hawass , head of Egypt's antiquities authority since 2002. He was made a cabinet minister last week. at Rupert Murdoch 's News of The World tabloid while he was in charge. "I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications," David Cameron said in a statement. Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government. Andy Coulson is a trusted aide and his departure is a blow to David Cameron , whose office had long insisted he would stay on despite the scandal.
